channel.title: Help - Opening Up My Server?
channel.description:
Ok, I'm Having Problems Opening Up My Server To Everyone. All I Can Do Is Login By Putting In My User And Pass, And In The Server IP Section, I Leave It Blank, And Log In, And Im In. But I Don't Know How To Make It So Anyone Can Get Onto It By Going To Saradomin.No-ip.biz. So If Any One Could Help Me, It Would Be Great. Thanks Alought,
-Will

item.title: Help - Opening Up My Server?
item.dc:creator: @Khasck Khasck
item.description:
@Khasck wrote:

already have www.no-clip.com host, and downloaded.
it looks as if everything is set up, i just need to open the server up or somthing.
1.) i have the IP adress
2.) i have the server running
3.) i have my soarce open
4.) i have no-ip running
5.) i have moparscape running

but no one can log in.

Read full topic

Ok, I’m Having Problems Opening Up My Server To Everyone.
All I Can Do Is Login By Putting In My User And Pass, And In The Server IP Section, I Leave It Blank, And Log In, And Im In.
